Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-30204 affecting package moby-engine for versions less than 24.0.9-16
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-30204 affecting package moby-engine for versions less than 24.0.9-16. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package moby-engine is earlier than 24.0.9-16, affected by CVE-2025-30204
